titles: A remarkable revelation of the wandrings of the Church of England i idolatry, superstition and ceremonies from the first motion throught each particular station to the first great period : in parallell with the children of Israel in the desert from Rameses to mount Sinai / by H. Walker ...
author: Walker, Henry, Ironmonger.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Church of England --  Customs and practices.
